column1: I see a lot of black people using the coronavirus as an excuse to tell racist jokes about Asian people and I just hope some of y’all to have that same energy when non-black people make racist Ebola and HIV jokes.

So upsetting that East Asians afraid for their lives because of their Heritage... Whew!! Non-Asians Are making Yellow Peril is shining brighter than ever!! #CoronavirusOutbreak #coronavirusaustralia #Coronavirus
